snippet: The trailer of an unfinished documentary posted on the fund-raising website Kickstarter made the claim that the consumer review website operator was extorting money from small businesses.
lead_paragraph: The trailer of an unfinished documentary posted on the fund-raising website Kickstarter made the claim that the consumer review website operator was extorting money from small businesses.

headline.main: Yelp Shares Fall 4.7% After Claim in Film Trailer
headline.print_headline: Yelp Shares Fall Sharply After Claim In Film Trailer
